sentences.sentence: They seem destitute of ordinary human feelings.
sentences.translation: 他们似乎一点人情味都没有。

sentences.sentence: When he died, his family was left completely destitute.
Poor people-the destitute, disease ridden and malnourished "bottom billion" -live in poor countries.
sentences.translation: 穷人——穷困、疾病缠身、营养不良的“底层十亿人”——生活在穷国。
